metadata.Plot: Grace Hazlett, reeling from the brutal discovery of her husband's adultery, takes their young son Adam to move back to her old family home. Her mother Isabel, now widowed, is a busy GP and set in her own.
metadata.Actors: Niamh Cusack, Rowena Cooper, Andrew Lincoln
